welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alfonso, Philippines, a charming town known for its beautiful landscapes, cool climate, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it primarily serves domestic flights for low-cost carriers.
